title: Mama Fairy and the Woodcutter
overview: Mama Fairy and the Woodcutter follows a fairy who after losing her clothes while bathing, meets a woodcutter and marries him. After her husband's accidental death, she waits for him to be reincarnated. She is a 699-year-old barista and to ordinary people appears very old, but to special people, she appears young and also has the ability to converse with plants.
